title: Taj Mahal, India
description: A white marble mausoleum located in Agra, India, built by Mughal Emperor Shah Jahan in memory of his wife Mumtaz Mahal.

title: Paris, France
description: The City of Light, known for its art, fashion, and gastronomy. Visit the Eiffel Tower, Louvre Museum, and Notre-Dame Cathedral.

title: Kyoto, Japan
description: A city rich in history and culture, famous for its traditional wooden houses, temples, and beautiful gardens.

title: New York City, USA
description: A bustling metropolis known for its iconic landmarks such as Times Square, Central Park, and the Statue of Liberty.

title: Cape Town, South Africa
description: A stunning coastal city with a diverse culture, beautiful beaches, and landmarks like Table Mountain and the V&A Waterfront.

title: Sydney, Australia
description: Known for its stunning harbor, Sydney Opera House, and Bondi Beach. Enjoy a mix of urban and natural attractions.

title: Rome, Italy
description: A city steeped in history with landmarks like the Colosseum, Roman Forum, and Vatican City.

title: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
description: Famous for its vibrant culture, beautiful beaches, and iconic landmarks like Christ the Redeemer and Sugarloaf Mountain.

title: Dubai, UAE
description: A modern city known for its luxury shopping, ultramodern architecture, and landmarks such as the Burj Khalifa and Palm Jumeirah.

title: Barcelona, Spain
description: A city famous for its unique architecture by Antoni Gaudí, including the Sagrada Família and Park Güell.

title: Istanbul, Turkey
description: A city that straddles two continents, known for its rich history, the Hagia Sophia, and the Grand Bazaar.

title: Bangkok, Thailand
description: A vibrant city known for its bustling street life, ornate temples, and vibrant nightlife.
